name: Neon Streets
description:
Mutants are invading every street corner, a quarantine was put in place.

This is the perfect chance for your street gang to rise up in the ranks!

Travel through these neon streets completing jobs for your gang!

Music:

Moose from bensound.org

SFX:

Kenney Assets

ChiptTone

#firstPerson #drive #cyberpunk #future #neon
